name: DeactivateEnterpriseMemberTrello
description:
Deactivate a member in a Trello enterprise.

This tool deactivates a specified member within a Trello enterprise. Note that deactivation is not possible for enterprises using AdminHub for user management.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise to deactivate a member in. This is required to identify the correct enterprise.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: member_id_to_deactivate
parameters.description: The ID of the member to deactivate in the Trello enterprise.

value_schema.description: ID of the Member to deactive.

parameters.name: deactivate_user
parameters.description: Set to true to deactivate the user, and false to keep them active.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the user is deactivated or not.

parameters.name: member_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated values for filtering member fields to deactivate. Only 'id' is valid.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of any valid values that the [nested member field resource]() accepts.

parameters.name: organization_field_value
parameters.description: Specify a valid organization field value such as 'id' or 'name' that the nested organization resource accepts.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: board_field_values
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of board fields to retrieve, such as id, name, or desc.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Determines whether the user is deactivated or not.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the user is deactivated or not.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of any valid values that the [nested member field resource]() accepts.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of any valid values that the [nested member field resource]() accepts.

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: board_fields
parameters.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: idMember
parameters.description: ID of the Member to deactive.

value_schema.description: ID of the Member to deactive.
